device_alarm.title: Wake up device remotely.
device_alarm.description: An Alarm will be raised on the mobile device, even if the device is turned into silent mode. This will be put off, once the device is unlocked. Are you sure you want to continue?

first.label: Now
first.hints: If you want to set alarm immediately, so don't change the default value and enable immediate option.

first.label: Enable
first.hints: If you want to make the phone show the alarm even if it has been passed, so set this true.
